import "./post.css" import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons" import {Users} from "../../dummyData" import { useState } from "react" export default function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) const [isLiked, setIsLike] = useState(false) return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter(u=>u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
